message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low, I'm willing to come down to $160. I believe this product is worth every penny.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
